concept.title: Fixed Size Arrays Overview
concept.shortdesc: This document is an overview of fixed size arrays.

section.title: Purpose
section.p: Provides a simple wrapper to C++ arrays with additional automatic checking of index values.

section.title: Description
section.p: Fixed Size Arrays provide an inexpensive but defensive programming alternative to standard C++ arrays. Panics are produced on attempts to access out-of-range index values.
The fixed sized array interface is provided by TFixedArray <class T, TInt S>.
